name: Adventuring With Friends
description:
A recreation of a classic adventure game with new/classic levels and networked multiplayer support. Make your way through the dungeons with your friends. Watch out for dragons! If you get eaten, maybe one of your adventuring friends can slay the dragon and free you!

Supports classic joysticks and gamepads. On the keyboard you can use the arrow keys and and space or enter keys for actions.

Notes: To play multiplayer over the internet, the host may need to setup port forwarding on their router. The game uses port 3074 by default. This can be configured in the settings.json file included with the game.
